price: 83. Toen redden Wij hem en zijn gezin behalve zijn vrouw; zij was één van degenen die achterbleef.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-ahlahu illā im'ra-atahu kānat mina al-ghābirīna
